SELECT SI_PRESENTATION_ITEM_ID , SI_ADVANCED_SEARCH_CONDITION_ID , MS_SI_PRESENTATION_ID , ON_OFF_FLAG , SHOW_ORDER ,
DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS
FROM SI_PRESENTATION_ITEM
WHERE DELETE_FLAG = 0

UPDATE SI_PRESENTATION_ITEM SET
SI_ADVANCED_SEARCH_CONDITION_ID = :SI_ADVANCED_SEARCH_CONDITION_ID MS_SI_PRESENTATION_ID = :MS_SI_PRESENTATION_ID, ON_OFF_FLAG = :ON_OFF_FLAG, SHOW_ORDER = :SHOW_ORDER,
,DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG ,SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG ,VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID ,DATA_NO = :DATA_NO ,USER_KEY = :USER_KEY ,RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE ,RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID ,TS = :TS
WHERE SI_PRESENTATION_ITEM_ID = :SI_PRESENTATION_ITEM_ID AND TS = :TS
